title: Create custom connectors in Power Bi
excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to create a custom connector in Power BI.  Link to Github site:  https://github.com/Microsoft/DataConnectors    Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
